form.label: Cron Toolkit - Schedule Builder - Compare
form.description: Compare cron schedules of different scheduled searches.

search.query: | rest /servicesNS/-/-/saved/searches splunk_server=local search="disabled=0" search="is_scheduled=1" | dedup eai:acl.app | fields eai:acl.app
| rest /servicesNS/-/-/saved/searches splunk_server=local search="disabled=0" search="is_scheduled=1" search="eai:acl.app=\"$app_name$\"" | dedup eai:acl.owner | fields eai:acl.owner

| rest /servicesNS/-/-/saved/searches splunk_server=local search="disabled=0" search="is_scheduled=1" search="eai:acl.owner=\"$owner$\"" search="eai:acl.app=\"$app_name$\"" | dedup title | fields title cron_schedule | eval title_cron=title." (".cron_schedule.")"

| rest /servicesNS/-/-/saved/searches splunk_server=local search="disabled=0" search="is_scheduled=1" | fields title eai:acl.app eai:acl.owner cron_schedule | search title IN ($search_name$) eai:acl.app="$app_name$" eai:acl.owner="$owner$" | eval start_time="$start_time$", end_time="$end_time$" | eval start_time=case(start_time == "now", now(), isnull(start_time) OR start_time == "", null(), true(), relative_time(now(), start_time)) | eval end_time=case(end_time == "now", now(), isnull(end_time) OR end_time == "", null(), true(), relative_time(now(), end_time)) | cronlistruns schedule=cron_schedule end=end_time start=start_time limit=$trigger_count_limit$ | mvexpand triggers | rename triggers as _time | table _time title

| rest /servicesNS/-/-/saved/searches splunk_server=local search="disabled=0" search="is_scheduled=1" | fields title eai:acl.app eai:acl.owner cron_schedule | search title IN ($search_name$) eai:acl.app="$app_name$" eai:acl.owner="$owner$" | eval start_time="$start_time$", end_time="$end_time$" | eval start_time=case(start_time == "now", now(), isnull(start_time) OR start_time == "", null(), true(), relative_time(now(), start_time)) | eval end_time=case(end_time == "now", now(), isnull(end_time) OR end_time == "", null(), true(), relative_time(now(), end_time)) | cronlistruns schedule=cron_schedule end=end_time start=start_time limit=$trigger_count_limit$ | mvexpand triggers | rename triggers as _time | stats count as "Concurrent Searches" by _time
